articles.author: Nikolas Lanum
articles.title: CBS, ABC, CNN sound the alarm on coronavirus BA.5, call for masking: ‘The worst variant is here’ - Fox News
articles.description: Media outlets such as CNN, CBS and ABC are urging Americans to take back up coronavirus prevention measures such as masking in the wake of a new variant.
articles.content:
The left-leaning media is sounding the alarm on the new COVID-19 variant labeled BA.5, asserting that its a "big deal" and calling for people to mask up and get boosted.
